name: 4ga-boards
description: 4gaBoards is an open-source, self-hostable Kanban-style task-management web app designed for real-time collaboration. It features dark mode, intuitive drag-&-drop boards with multi-level hierarchy (projects → boards → lists → cards → tasks), advanced Markdown editing, import/export support (including from Trello), and simplified wide-screen UI with minimal clutter. Built with React/Redux on the front end and Sails.js/Knex/PostgreSQL on the back end, 4gaBoards is published under the MIT License and supports Docker / Kubernetes deployment.
features: Real-Time Collaboration: Work together on visual Kanban boards with instant updates. Team productivity amplified.
Flexible Hierarchy: Organize from high-level projects down to granular tasks. Structure that scales with you.
Drag-and-Drop: Intuitive interface makes task management completely effortless. Move work with ease.
Dark Mode: Comfortable viewing in any lighting condition or preference. Easy on the eyes.
Rich Formatting: Markdown support enables detailed, well-formatted descriptions. Express ideas clearly.
Trello Import: Seamlessly migrate your existing boards without data loss. Switch platforms painlessly.
Clean Design: Wide-screen interface minimizes clutter and distractions. Focus on what matters.
Stable Foundation: React, Redux, and PostgreSQL ensure reliable performance. Built to last.
